lyrics.text:
Ke ke fa’a valoki
Hoku laumālie,
‘Oka ofi ‘ a e kovi,
Mo ke tokoni mai.

‘O kau ka afe si’i
Ki he to’omata’u
Pe ki he nima to’ohema,
‘Ofa ke u ongo’i.

‘A e le’o ‘o’ou
“Ke ke tafoki mai,
He ko eni, ko ho hala,
Ke ke foki ki ai. “

Pea u fakaongo,
Ki ho’o folofola;
Pea u ‘alu ‘i he hala
‘Oku angatonu.

’Oku ou tuku ni
Hoku laumālie,
Ki he ‘Afiona, ‘Eiki;
Pea fai ma’u ai pē.

Ko e unga’anga,
Fakalaumālie;
Sīsū, ‘a e ‘Afiona,
‘I he tu’utāmaki.
